item.description:
We will finish up on the details for the first ever FPA EAA Chapter 1454, June 14th EAA Young Eagles Rally and more.

We will have Jeff Hill from Liebfried Aviation talk with us about pre-buy inspections. Know before you buy!

Food will be a cookout on our new grille. Dogs and burgers. Cooked by Bob and Matt Scales...

If you missed the last meeting, you missed a lot!
item.why: Dinner, slide show and chat from 6:00 - 7:00. Meeting starts at 7:00. Always a good time.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association June Meeting
